ygData.subject: RE: Scars of Velious
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail all, I had heard the access to the new continent would be through Ak Anon. Yesterday, some guildmates mentioned there being a new dock in North Ro. We
ygData.messageBody:
Hail all,

I had heard the access to the new continent would be through Ak'Anon.
Yesterday, some guildmates mentioned there being a new dock in North Ro. We
speculated this could be the evil races dock to the new land, much like the
South Ro dock. I haven't been to North Ro myself to confirm.

I bought the 49th song in Erudin and used it this weekend. We were in Hate
and CoM with another guild so no definitive results. We couldn't tell if we
healed less. The song does have some taunt factor, I noticed some mobs would
whack me at least once when it cycled, but not every time. The Concert Hall
has a list of Velious songs, it included the new 49th song proir to it's
introduction so probably have to take that list as a possibles list for now.

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Excalibur, Xegony
